helperStatements.1:
<a:emote1:958789622312345621> **__Welcome to Circus Extravaganza aka SP SOC Freshman Orientation Camp 2022/23!__** <a:emote1:958789622312345621> 

Today <@193924804812734464>, <@831931154265276427> and <@284922983989116928> will be your **Group Leaders**! 

We will be bringing you through these 2 days of virtual camp in our lovely Discord here with various games and activities to help you break the ice with your fellow peers from SOC. 

<:emote2:958789622836658227> So stay tuned for all the wonderful joy we hope to bring you! <:emote2:958789622836658227> 


To start things off, we will first go through with a round of **__self introduction__**, with the following information:
‚Ä¢ Name
‚Ä¢ Age 
‚Ä¢ Course
‚Ä¢ Item that represents you
‚Ä¢ How does this item represents you
‚Ä¢ Your most desired superpower
‚Ä¢ A downside / weakness to the previous person's superpower
helperStatements.2:
<:emote3:958792425579630672> We are now moving on to the Identity Making Activity! <:emote3:958792425579630672> 

GLs will explain about the Identity Making and you can use the following link after the GLs have finished explaining!

Do not that there's no __**STRICTLY NO**__ drawing of the following:

‚Ä¢ **NSFW (Not Safe for Work)** content.
‚Ä¢ **Nudity, genitalia or other sexual** content.
‚Ä¢ Content that depicts **discrimination against minorities**.
‚Ä¢ **Racism or sexist **content.
‚Ä¢ Any other content that may be deemed **__INAPPROPRIATE__**.

Other than that, let's have fun building our team's identity! <a:emote4:958792425634168842> 

Link for Activity: https://jamboard.google.com/d/1aWHeJuXStKNrtJpaM9NDvZxaWr4SnuMiGtrUu2gZEkM/edit?usp=sharing
helperStatements.3:
Hey hey hey!
